about_hero.heading: Advancing Technology to Unlock Value
about_hero.description:
At Gigantech, we transform businesses through AI-powered, intelligent, and 
scalable technology solutions. Our expertise spans Artificial Intelligence, 
Web & Mobile Applications, Cloud Platforms, and Digital Transformation, 
enabling organizations to innovate faster, operate smarter, and unlock 
sustainable growth.

aboutHeroCard.title: Our Mission
aboutHeroCard.description: To advance technology that creates measurable value for businesses and people everywhere.

aboutHeroCard.title: Our Vision
aboutHeroCard.description:
To be the trusted global partner for organizations seeking to stay ahead through AI, innovation, and future-ready
technology.

aboutHeroCard.title: Our Focus
aboutHeroCard.description:
We specialize in blending intelligence with innovation—building solutions 
that are smart, secure, and scalable. From AI-driven automation to 
enterprise-grade platforms, our focus is on solving complex challenges with 
practical, business-ready technology.

partner_choice.heading: Why we are the partner of choice for our clients

partnerChoiceCard.title: Partnerships That Last
partnerChoiceCard.description:
We build long-term client relationships through 
trust, value creation, and consistent delivery.

partnerChoiceCard.title: Value Through Innovation
partnerChoiceCard.description:
Our expert engineers tackle challenging 
projects, delivering solutions that make a real difference.

partnerChoiceCard.title: Proven capabilities
partnerChoiceCard.description:
From enterprise software to AI platforms, we design 
solutions that improve safety, efficiency, and growth across industries.

partnerChoiceCard.title: Top Global Talent
partnerChoiceCard.description:
Our teams include leading AI specialists, architects, 
and engineers with deep domain knowledge.

partnerChoiceCard.title: Global Presence
partnerChoiceCard.description:
With teams across North America, the UK, and the 
Middle East, we offer seamless collaboration and time zone alignment.

partnerChoiceCard.title: Experience You Can Trust
partnerChoiceCard.description:
Backed by over a decade of real-world project 
delivery, we combine technical mastery with a client-first approach.

about_story.heading: Our Story
about_story.firstParagraph: Gigantech began with a vision to harness Artificial Intelligence as a true engine of transformation. From a small team of forward-thinkers, we have grown into a trusted global partner, helping organizations apply AI to solve complex challenges. Our early breakthroughs in automation, analytics, and safety-critical systems established us as leaders in industries such as rail and utilities, laying the foundation for broader innovation.
about_story.secondParagraph: Today, we continue to expand into education, enterprise productivity, customer engagement, and Agriculture—always with AI at the core. Our platforms enable automated grading, personalized learning, intelligent collaboration, and seamless multi-platform support. By combining cutting-edge AI with practical applications, we empower businesses to accelerate digital transformation, enhance safety and compliance, improve productivity, and unlock new growth opportunities.

contact_section.title: Let’s Build Your Digital Success Story
contact_section.description: With decades of expertise and hundreds of future-ready solutions delivered globally, Gigantech combines technical mastery and industry insights to turn complex challenges into growth. Partner with a team trusted by enterprises worldwide—where technology meets innovation.

Input.label: How did you hear about us?

footerSteps.firstStep: An expert contacts you after having analyzed your requirements
footerSteps.secondStep: If needed, we sign an NDA to ensure the highest privacy level
footerSteps.thirdStep: We submit a comprehensive project proposal with estimates, timelines, CVs, etc.
